caption.p: (Top) IPCC SREX regions: Domains considered in regional analyses based on the definition used in the IPCC Special Report on Managing the Risks of Extreme Events and Disasters to Advance Climate Change Adaptation [ Seneviratne et al., 2012]. (Bottom) Box plots for the IPCC SREX regions (except region 2) displaying evapotranspiration (ET) in each region in the CMIP5 (“C5”) and CMIP3 (“C3”) model simulations (statistics for multiyear averages (1989–1995) for the ensemble of analyzed models, see Table 1). The respective ET estimates of the LandFlux-EVAL merged synthesis data set's median (full line) and interquartile ranges (dashed lines) are indicated in blue (red) in cases of overestimation (underestimation) of the CMIP5 models.
